message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I know you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its unique benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of the value it will bring you.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your proposal, but my budget is quite limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,380,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range.
